info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 3:01PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Schenectady, northeastern Albany and south central Saratoga Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 301 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Niskayuna, or over Schenectady, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Schenectady, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, Cohoes, Colonie, Scotia, Niskayuna, Waterford, Round Lake, Country Knolls, Alplaus, East Glenville, Burnt Hills, Halfmoon, Malta, Shakers, Glenridge, Harding Crossing, Coons and Garrison Manor. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 exit 25 and near exit 26. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 6 and 7, and between exits 8A and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
